description:
Takt and crew finally reach their destination of New York. They reunite with Charlotte, Anna`s older sister, who works for the Symphonica`s technological development department. Charlotte begins to examine Destiny. Who is an incomplete Musicart. But then, Anna realizes something is wrong with Takt. The mark on Takt`s right arm starts to spread to the rest of his body, and...
Source: crunchyroll
